equipment.name: Excavator CAT 320
equipment.description: 20-ton hydraulic excavator with advanced control systems and excellent fuel efficiency. Perfect for medium to large construction projects.

equipment.name: Bulldozer D6
equipment.description: Powerful track-type tractor with semi-universal blade, ideal for heavy earthmoving and construction work.

equipment.name: Crane LIEBHERR LTM
equipment.description: Mobile crane with 200-ton lifting capacity. Features state-of-the-art control systems and excellent maneuverability.
